config.subtitle: Former Raiders Wide Receiver Henry Ruggs III Involved in Fatal Crash
config.text: Henry Ruggs III, a former wide receiver for the Las Vegas Raiders, faces felony charges of driving under the influence causing death or substantial bodily injury and reckless driving following a crash early Tuesday morning.
